Articles.Content:
By ish I mean that I have given it missiles in place of AA guns and such. I did this because I want to battle with it when .24 comes.

She is made up of 704ish parts and has a fairly impressive amount of firepower, I still need to work on fuel consumption and circulation as she requires a lot of power to move.

She is armed with 12 I-beam shells, 12 small missiles and 1 cruise missile.

Pics:

Sorry for the missing download, when she is properly finished I will provide one.

Actually I've got one here for you all. A finished version will be put in the OP.

http://www./download/aj24ub59z23s9p0/HMS+Belfast.craft

Edited July 13, 2014 by Megalodon 720
That looks awesome! I'm going to download the unfinished version and the finished version! So cool!
